text: niyata vasayenma numbalage paramadhipati vana allah ohu ahas ha mahapolova dina hayakin mava pasu va ohu rajasanaya (ars) mata sthapita viya. ohu siyalu karunu sælasum karayi. ohuge anumætiyen pasu va misa (ohu idiriye) venat kisidu mædihatkaruvaku nomæta. ohuya numbalage paramadhipati vana allah. ebævin numbala ohuta gætikam karanu. numbala menehi kala yutu nove da
